languages.text: "Ведьма права, что-то не так. Визоры Глейто реагируют на тени — такого быть не должно".
languages.translation_comment:
During Heinrix's second quest (to help Emelina on a dark, corrupted world under attack by Mandrakes).
Idira: "Darkness... There is darkness everywhere, biting, hungering — and it's all wrong... Watch where you tread. One misstep, and this doom will swallow you."

traits.locale_text: "Ведьма права, что-то не так. Визоры Глейто реагируют на тени — такого быть не должно".

languages.text: "The witch is right, something is off. Glaito's visors are reacting to the shadows — that is not normal."
languages.translation_comment:
During Heinrix's second quest (to help Emelina on a dark, corrupted world under attack by Mandrakes).
Idira: "Darkness... There is darkness everywhere, biting, hungering — and it's all wrong... Watch where you tread. One misstep, and this doom will swallow you."
languages.original_text: "Ведьма права, что-то не так. Визоры Глейто реагируют на тени — такого быть не должно".

traits.locale_text: "The witch is right, something is off. Glaito's visors are reacting to the shadows — that is not normal."
"The witch is right, something is off. Glaito's visors are reacting to the shadows — that is not normal."
"The witch is right, something is off. Glaito's visors are reacting to the shadows — that is not normal."
"The witch is right, something is off. Glaito's visors are reacting to the shadows — that is not normal."
"The witch is right, something is off. Glaito's visors are reacting to the shadows — that is not normal."
"The witch is right, something is off. Glaito's visors are reacting to the shadows — that is not normal."

languages.text: 「魔女の言うとおりだ、何かがおかしい。グライトのバイザーが影に反応している―普通じゃない」
languages.original_text: "The witch is right, something is off. Glaito's visors are reacting to the shadows — that is not normal."

traits.locale_text: 「魔女の言うとおりだ、何かがおかしい。グライトのバイザーが影に反応している―普通じゃない」

languages.text: "Die Hexe hat recht, hier stimmt etwas nicht. Glaitos Visoren reagieren auf Schatten, das ist nicht normal."
languages.original_text: "The witch is right, something is off. Glaito's visors are reacting to the shadows — that is not normal."

traits.locale_text: "Die Hexe hat recht, hier stimmt etwas nicht. Glaitos Visoren reagieren auf Schatten, das ist nicht normal."

languages.text: « La sorcière a raison, quelque chose ne va pas. Les visières de Glaito réagissent aux ombres, et ça, ce n'est pas normal. »
languages.original_text: "The witch is right, something is off. Glaito's visors are reacting to the shadows — that is not normal."

traits.locale_text: « La sorcière a raison, quelque chose ne va pas. Les visières de Glaito réagissent aux ombres, et ça, ce n'est pas normal. »

languages.text: «La bruja tiene razón, algo no va bien. Los visores de Glaito reaccionan a las sombras; eso no es normal».
languages.original_text: "The witch is right, something is off. Glaito's visors are reacting to the shadows — that is not normal."

traits.locale_text: «La bruja tiene razón, algo no va bien. Los visores de Glaito reaccionan a las sombras; eso no es normal».

languages.text: “那个女巫说得没错，事情不太对劲。格雷托的面甲竟然会对影子产生反应，这显然很不正常。”
languages.original_text: "The witch is right, something is off. Glaito's visors are reacting to the shadows — that is not normal."

traits.locale_text: “那个女巫说得没错，事情不太对劲。格雷托的面甲竟然会对影子产生反应，这显然很不正常。”

languages.text: "Cadı haklı, yanlış giden bir şeyler var. Glaito'nun vizörleri gölgelere tepki veriyor, normalde böyle yapmaz."
languages.original_text: "The witch is right, something is off. Glaito's visors are reacting to the shadows — that is not normal."

traits.locale_text: "Cadı haklı, yanlış giden bir şeyler var. Glaito'nun vizörleri gölgelere tepki veriyor, normalde böyle yapmaz."

languages.original_text: "The witch is right, something is off. Glaito's visors are reacting to the shadows — that is not normal."
